description: In the premiere of The Dude Show - Reality Sucks! we're introduced to housemates Brandon Lewis and Tucker Vaughn. Brandon, a Southern charmer with a killer smile, has a secret; he loves kinky sex. All-American Tucker joins Brandon for lunch in the loft kitchen and immediately begins flirting. It turns out that Tucker loves to get fucked. Brandon is down for that - and more! Once he sees Tucker's big cock he decides to take it for a ride!
title: The Dude Show 1, Scene #01
